name: It's Always Your Turn
description:
You are the blue mage, and have to kill the red mage (CPU). Both players draw at the time, slowly at first but it gets faster as the game goes on. You can play your cards whenever you want, as fast as you want.

Controls :  Each card in your hand is mapped to a key on your keyboard (Q W E R T Y or 1 2 3 4 5 6 by default).

Hold the key to select and preview card, then release the key to play it at the position of your cursor.

Cards :

Monsters have their HP in red, and their power in blue. They can be melee or ranged.

There are only 2 spells : The Fireball spell that deals damages in AoE, and the Teleport spell that moves all monsters hit to a random location.
